cause.description:
We don't support any particular party or candidate but we think it is important the young gay and straight voters realize how important their voices are.
Don't let the old people screw-up the world any more than they already have!
1. Its your future, stupid.
cause.mission: to support 18-35 year-olds and get them involved in the politcal process
cause.name: TEP Empowerment of Young People
